name: Claymore Clicker (Sword Clicker)
description:
Hello, my name is g0ld, I am 11 years old, I have 2 years of coding/programming experience, I created a club called 8inc games. So this is it, there is a lot I will add

(Lore,Characther,Swords,Boss Fights, Online scoreboard that you can see other people) The game is 10% done. Please comment your suggestions and ideas, it really helps!
